hero.title: The Codex
introBody: The Codex holds how Mōchirīī lives, speaks & looks after each other.
Read it once, revisit it often & use it to keep the guild clear & welcoming.

intro.title: A shared standard
body: The Codex keeps culture consistent across time zones & playstyles.
It sets conduct expectations, outlines how disputes gets handled & describes how we keep community life active with room to breathe.

tenets.title: Tenets
tenets.description: These tenets shape our tone in parties, chat & shared spaces.
tenets.caption: A shared standard turns good intent into stable conduct when fights get loud.
tenets.note: Choose one tenet before an event & practice it deliberately.

items.title: Harmony
items.description: Keep the group coordinated, share space well & communicate with care.

items.title: Generosity
items.description: Offer help as an invitation & match the other person's pace.

items.title: Respect
items.description: Speak thoughtfully, assume good faith & leave room to recover from mistakes.

items.title: Reliability
items.description: Show up in small, repeatable ways that keep momentum & trust intact.

items.title: Craft
items.description: Improve with patience & pass knowledge in clear steps that others can follow.

items.title: Joy
items.description: Keep the guild bright by celebrating wins & making space for laughter.

etiquette.title: Etiquette
etiquette.description: Etiquette protects trust during fast play: chat tone, mentoring habits & how we solve disputes.

blocks.title: Chat
items: Keep messages readable, especially during events & calls.
Welcome new voices with simple replies & helpful context.
Use teasing with clarity & make it easy to opt out.

blocks.title: Mentoring
items: Offer help as an invitation & match the learner's pace.
Ask questions freely & answer with patience & specifics.
Share builds & tips in a way that leaves room for personal style.

blocks.title: Repair
items: Move tense topics to private messages early.
Bring in a hall leader when emotions rise or patterns repeat.
Restore trust through accountability & one concrete next step.

etiquette.note: Keep disputes small, private & actionable; return to the work with dignity.

rhythm.title: Rhythm
rhythm.description: Rhythm is our pace: enough structure to meet & grow, enough ease to keep play restorative.
rhythm.caption: Mōchirīī favors consistent participation & leaves room for real life.
rhythm.note: Post plans early, communicate changes plainly & keep the shared pace gentle.

items.title: Hall Runs
items.description: Posted with time zones & goals; parties form with light role notes & clear start times.

items.title: Raffles
items.description: A thank-you for presence & spirit; rules stay pinned & winners are announced cleanly.

items.title: Notices
items.description: Patch notes that affect builds & guild decisions are shared with enough lead time to plan.

items.title: Quiet Time
items.description: Roam, farm, craft, or chat casually while staying connected to the guild's community.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Recognition is how we say “we see you,” marking effort, care & the kind of consistency that draws others in.

items.title: Follow-through
items.description: Showing up over time through runs, events, chat help & small acts that keep things moving forward.

items.title: Service
items.description: Helping others progress, sharing knowledge, organizing parties & making guild spaces easier to use.

items.title: Composure
items.description: Keeping a clear tone under stress, honoring commitments & protecting harmony in public channels.
